context: Hi, how are you? Did you enjoy your weekend?
HI, Im good how are you? I did. What about you?
Nice! I'm well. I enjoyed my weekend. I saw Deadpool 2 (2018) with my bf. Did you see it?
No! I do want to see it though, it looks funny.
resp: Yeah, I liked the first one, Deadpool (2016) Did you see that one? If not, you definitely should watch it in order.
